alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 1:24PM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with 1 to 2 inches over eastern portions of the basin, from Lovell to Worland. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph, mainly Tuesday evening. * WHERE...Cody Foothills, North Bighorn Basin, Southwest Bighorn Basin and Southeast Bighorn Basin. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized blizzard conditions will be possible with this event.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
